description: Extract repeated subquery patterns into a CTE to avoid recomputation
Convert correlated subquery to separate CTE with GROUP BY, then JOIN
Extract shared dimension filters (date, item, promotion) into CTEs when multiple channel CTEs (store/catalog/web) apply identical filters independently
Convert INTERSECT subquery pattern to multiple EXISTS clauses for better join planning
Extract date filtering into a separate CTE to enable predicate pushdown and reduce scans
